title: Sync Across Devices
requirement:
Enable real-time synchronization of user data, including playlists, streaming history, and preferences across smartphones, desktops, and tablets.  
#### Screens:  
* Device Management Screen: Show list of connected devices and sync status.  
#### Personas:  
* Multi-Device User: Switches seamlessly between devices during daily use.  
* Global Traveler: Prefers syncing across portable and static devices for flexibility.
